1076480.name: Dream Flash
1076480.description:
Dream Flash is a fast paced boss rush rogue-lite that follows a soul exploring the dreamscape. Collect a wide array of items and weapons in order to make the soul even more powerful. Gain the power to transform into even stronger forms in order to combat increasingly difficult enemies.



Each run the soul gains recollection on everything encountered. Go deeper and deeper into the dream in order to unlock memories from the soul's past.



Dream Flash has tons of content. Players will be able to explore the dreamscape for dozens of hours in order to unlock everything. Here is a list of planned content for the finished version of the game:

- 85+ Bosses to Fight
- 100+ Weapons
- 300+ Items
- 10+ States
- 4 Complete Chapters for the soul to explore fully
- Wild Secrets that will remain hidden until closer to release

As of right now there are 70+ bosses, 85+ weapons, and 300+ items. More content is planned for the early access build every few months so keep a look out for even more things to play around with.
